ComicInfo.Summary: From the creative minds of Image partners Robert Kirkman & Marc Silvestri! The most exciting year of Pilot Season begins next month, but thanks to an inside source at Top Cow HQ, fans can find out the secrets behind the inception of the five new properties from Kirkman and Silvestri! Pilot Season: Declassified is filled with top secret design sketches and documents, along with trailer pages from the five properties.
ComicInfo.Title: Murderer, Demonic, Stealth, Stellar and Hardcore
